prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Manuscripts of James Fenimore Cooper, Accession # 6245-f, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Purchased from Seven Gables Bookshop on November 29, 1962.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains manuscripts in the James Fenimore Cooper collection, including letters from Susan Fenimore Cooper, R. Cooper, and George Washington Greene; also included are a typescript and print of Otsego Hall, 1852 and n.d.

did.unittitle: Letter from Susan Fenimore Cooper June 25, 1852

scopecontent.p: This item is from Susan Fenimore Cooper to an unknown recipient, re: Otsego Hall.

did.unittitle: Letter from Susan Fenimore Cooper July 2, 1852
did.physdesc: ALS, 1 p. with print of Otsego Hall

scopecontent.p: This item is from Susan Fenimore Cooper to an unknown recipient, with one page typescript and print of Otsego Hall, re: daguerreotype; mentions Spy.
This item is from R. Cooper to an unknown recipient, re: daguerreotype of Otsego Hall.

did.unittitle: Letter from George W. Greene to G.P. Putnam September 20, 1852

scopecontent.p: This item is from George Washington Greene to G.P. Putnam, with typescript copy, re: proofs for unidentified piece of writing. Mentions Webster.

did.unittitle: Letter from George W. Greene n.d.

scopecontent.p: This item is from George W. Greene to an unknown recipient, with typescript copy. Sends piece on Cooper. Mentions Webster.
